DOC.detailed_description: Obsessive Compulsive Disorder ( OCD ) chronic debilitate anxiety disorder . People OCD often experience recurrent unwanted thought , obsession . Some example obsession include follow : repetitive fear cause harm harm ; fear contamination illness ; fear make mistake ; intrusive distress sexual religious imagery ; fear lose thing . In effort relieve anxiety obsession , people OCD develop repetitive behavior call compulsion . Some example compulsion include follow : repetitive wash cleaning ; excessive checking ; excessive ordering arranging ; extreme hoard save . These thought behavior interfere everyday life great extent . Cognitive behavior therapy ( CBT ) exposure ritual prevention ( EX/RP ) standard treatment OCD . EX/RP involve imaginary real exposure situation setting may stimulate OCD behavior , require patient refrain ritualize . Motivational interviewing ( MI ) may help enhance individual 's motivation change explore resolve ambivalence . This study determine effectiveness add MI CBT consist EX/RP improve treatment outcome people OCD . Participants single-blind study randomly assign receive either standard CBT EX/RP CBT EX/RP plus MI . All participant report study site twice weekly therapy assessment total 2 month . Assessments include interview self-rating form . No medication administer study . However , participant continue medication taking time study entry . All participant assess outcomes upon study completion . Participants respond therapy assess 6 month follow study completion .
